messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: LOS ANGELES POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION DIVISION
Robbery-Homicide Section
SIGNAL: 34R
ITEM NUMBER: R-34088-07
PAGE 3 of 29
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Nathan Kim
Sgt. Olivia Martinez
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Eric Johnson
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Kyle Lee
Sgt. Anna Robinson
( Burglary Section)
Det. Miguel Hernandez
Det. Rachel Smith
( Burglary Section)
Det. Emma Torres
( Burglary Section)
Det. Sean Murphy
Det. Laura Davis
(General Assignment)
Det. Tyler Brown
(Auto Theft Section)
VICTIM:
JOHN SMITH, male, date of birth 03/18/1976.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
15 JULY 2007 at approximately 10:30 PM near the intersection of 5th and Main.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Eric Johnson
2849
During the inquiry, various witnesses provided conflicting accounts. Officer James, patrolling the vicinity, was first to the crime scene. He and Sgt. Kyle Lee, along with Patrol Officer Sandra, managed to secure the area. Technician Ryan, skilled in digital forensics, was brought in to assess the CCTV footage. Criminalist Parker, examining the gathered evidence, found a distinctive watch that was later linked to a suspect. Coroner Dr. Simmons was called to examine a deceased body found in an adjacent alley, initially deemed unrelated but later tied to the robbery. Patrol Officer Chen, engaging with local businesses, gathered further details that led to a potential suspect.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Nathan Kim Officer Context: Case supervisor in the Robbery-Homicide Section. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Olivia Martinez Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Kim. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Eric Johnson Officer Context: Lead case investigator, first to the crime scene. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Kyle Lee Officer Context: Assisted at the crime scene, affiliated with the Burglary Section. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Anna Robinson Officer Context: Burglary Section detective assisting in the robbery case. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Miguel Hernandez Officer Context: Part of the Burglary Section, assisting in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Rachel Smith Officer Context: Burglary Section detective, contributed to the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Emma Torres Officer Context: Another detective from the Burglary Section involved in the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Sean Murphy Officer Context: General assignment detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Laura Davis Officer Context: Assisted in the investigation, part of the General Assignment division. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Tyler Brown Officer Context: Auto Theft Section detective, involved in the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer James Officer Context: First officer at the crime scene, helped secure the area. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Sandra Officer Context: Assisted in securing the crime scene with Sgt. Lee. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Ryan Officer Context: Specialized in digital forensics, assessed CCTV footage. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Parker Officer Context: Examined evidence, found watch linked to suspect. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Simmons Officer Context: Examined body found in adjacent alley, linked it to robbery. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Chen Officer Context: Gathered additional details from local businesses. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
